channel.title: CVE Feed for Virames -- Vira-Investing
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Virames -- Vira-Investing

item.title: CVE-2023-1013|2023-03-31T09:03:01.453Z -- virames -- vira-investing
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Script-Related HTML Tags in a Web Page (Basic XSS) vulnerability in Virames Vira-Investing allows Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).This issue affects Vira-Investing: before 1.0.84.86.

item.title: CVE-2023-1014|2023-04-06T05:43:36.670Z -- virames -- vira-investing
item.description: Improper Protection for Outbound Error Messages and Alert Signals vulnerability in Virames Vira-Investing allows Account Footprinting.This issue affects Vira-Investing: before 1.0.84.86.
